about-text: Hi, I'm a german speaking certified Frontend Developer based near Marburg. My focus lies on the creation of user and mobile friendly applications. Its important to me to stay on track with the latest technologies, while remaining an eye on good practise and first principles to ensure maintainability, scalability, and a seamless user experience.
about-p1: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Marburg and remotely.
about-p2: I am hungry for new workflows, technologies and problem solving in general.
about-p3: I consider myself a team player. It's important to me to serve the big picture, to listen and support my team with all my knowledge and skillset.
myskills-p1: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
myskills-p3: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
